name: Honey Hunt
description:
The game is based on the theme of "honey" that was assigned by the NHTV University in order to be accepted. It's a 2D survival shooter where a bee (the player) must survive from hunger and enemy bees.

Controls:

  • Arroy keys
  • SPACE to Shoot
  • ESC to pause

I studied the book "SFML Game Development" (Haller et al, 2013) in order to be able to realise this game.
